column2: Muster the citizen-militia and petition the dedicated warriors of the Asur to action.
Construct imposing monuments to honour Nehekhara's ever-expanding borders.
The home berths of the famous Asur navies, from which their maritime power is projected.
Recruit or force Druchii warriors to obey your commands.
All units of Norsca including Marauders, beasts, and mutants, can be recruited here.
Where the dread ships return from raids across the seas, bringing stolen wealth and labour.
Gain support of the Old One Cults to enhance the potency of your warrior cohorts.
Bolster your Undead pirate crew with zombie mobs, ghoulish spectres, and monstrous abominations of the sea and air.
A solid gate or stout garrison keeps the invaders out.
Facilitates the recruitment of basic troops essential to any Beastmen warherd.
Lure and barter with the Greater Clans to make use of the Under-Empire’s many threats.
Halls belonging to various organisations that bolster the throngs.
Get yer Orc and Goblin units 'ere!
Even in times of war, industry and infrastructure will always be required.
Industry and infrastructure are the backbone of every successful Dwarfhold.
Murder and corruption are the business of pirates who wish to make a name for themselves.
Through smuggling, and maybe even some legal trade, pirates can make great sums of money.
Towers and garrisons to defend the city against invaders.
Accursed places where Undead minions can be pressed into service.
Support your Undead crews with artillery pieces, ghoulish spectres, and monstrous abominations of the sea.
Sorcerous black-stone defences to keep out intruders.
Towers and barricades provide bigger garrisons and boost a region’s defending armies.
Ports can generate income and growth, along with facilitating trade with factions from afar.
Recruit advanced units to join your host.
Awaken ancient and eternally loyal warriors, they followed their mighty rulers willingly unto death.
The economy of the Under-Empire is burgeoning with winners and losers - ensure you are a winner.
Upgrade parts of your galleon to improve its capabilities and bolster its crew.
Defensive spires, towers, and warded walls to repel any who dare invade.
Structures that boost income and help to expand and control the settlement.
A travelling band of soldiers, in thrall to no-one. Coin is their liege.
Recruit Dwarf infantry and forge powerful artillery.
All da borin' stuff dat makes our boyz betta!
Use powerful arcane wardings to defend settlements against foolish trespassers.
Recruit advanced units to join your warherd.
Subjugate and cajole the clan’s warriors into your own hordes.
Facilitates the recruitment of basic troops essential to any Chaos host.
The hidden nest-ports are berths for slave hulks - bringing in trade and wealth - and the sea-clans’ deadly vessels.
Enhance the Captain’s Quarters to improve your galleon’s capacity for growth and recruitment.
Constructing towers, walls, or other earthworks enables a bigger garrison, ensuring that pirate hovels are better protected.
Supportive structures maintained by mortal underlings and vampires.
Da thingz dat generate shiny stuff 'n keep da grubs under control.
Recruit zombie mobs, lesser Undead, and other conjured shipmates into your pirate crews.
Build and enhance these special features of your galleon to receive special benefits.
Recruit monstrous units, representative of the Nehekharan pantheon.
Good for keepin' da enemy gits off our turf!
Easily recognised from a distance, and unique to their home regions, landmarks enable travellers – and armies – to get their bearings.
Protect the warrens from enemy clans and over-grounders alike.
Temple-cities thrive when economic and industrial factors are improved.
Enhance Asur warriors and bring the full might of Ulthuan to bear.
An encampment of a travelling Warhost.
The dead will rise to assail anyone foolish enough to invade these lands.
Strengthen your pirate empire’s footing in the province by improving income, public order, and growth.
A region’s natural resources can be harnessed and put to good use by its controlling faction.
A city or stronghold with the potential to grow larger than others in the province.
Entice puissant followers and enhance Druchii military might.
Where rarely-seen Saurian vessels may dock, facilitating trade with faraway factions.
The economic and diplomatic power of the Asur is legendary; ensure it remains so.
Although in a state of decay, some structures can still be exploited economically.
Increase the temperature in the spawning pools, agitate primordial ooze, and grow fresh warriors.
Trade in slaves, trinkets and sensations to bolster and build the economy.
Improve the quality of your units and recruit mighty [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Heroes to bolster your armies.
Bolster your armies with tougher recruits trained in greater numbers.
The dead will rise to assail anyone foolish enough to invade these lands.
